name: lapras-mcp-server
description: MCP server for lapras.com - Search jobs, manage work experiences, and career planning
long_description:
The LAPRAS MCP Server enables AI assistants to interact with LAPRAS (https://lapras.com), a Japanese career platform. It provides tools for job search, work experience management, and career planning.

## Features
- **Job Search**: Search jobs with filters like keywords, minimum salary, and remote work options
- **Work Experience Management**: Create, read, update, and delete work experiences
- **Career Planning**: Manage job summaries and future career aspirations

## Requirements
- LAPRAS API Key (optional, required for work experience features)
- Get your API key from: https://lapras.com/config/api-key
